勢家: (せいか) - influential family; the man in power
勢揃: (せいぞろい) - array; muster; line-up; full force
勢揃い: (せいぞろい) - array; muster; line-up; full force
勢門: (せいもん) - influential family; the man in power
勤しむ: (いそしむ) - to endeavor; to endeavour; to work hard (at)
勤まらない: (つとまらない) - unfit for; unequal to
勤まる: (つとまる) - to be fit for; to be equal to; to function properly
勤める: (つとめる) - (usu. 勤める) to work (for)/to be employed (at)/to serve (in); (usu. 務める) to serve (as)/to act (as)/to fill (the position of)/to play the role (of); (usu. 勤める) to conduct a religious service
勤め上げる: (つとめあげる) - to serve out one's apprenticeship; to serve out one's time
勤め人: (つとめにん) - office worker; salaried man; white-collar worker
勤め働く: (つとめはたらく) - to work diligently
勤め口: (つとめぐち) - position; place of employment
勤め向き: (つとめむき) - one's business; one's duties
勤め帰り: (つとめがえり) - on the way home from work
勤め盛り: (つとめざかり) - the prime of one's career
勤め行なう: (つとめおこなう) - to carry on (work)
勤倹の風: (きんけんのふう) - custom (habit) of diligence and thrift
勤倹力行: (きんけんりっこう) - (yoji) work hard and practice frugality
勤倹貯蓄: (きんけんちょちく) - (yoji) thrift and saving
勤労: (きんろう) - labor; labour; exertion; diligent service
勤労動員: (きんろうどういん) - mobilization of labor services (e.g. in wartime)
勤労大衆: (きんろうたいしゅう) - working people
勤労奉仕: (きんろうほうし) - labor service; labour service
勤労意欲: (きんろういよく) - will to work
勤労感謝の日: (きんろうかんしゃのひ) - Labour Thanksgiving Day (November 23rd) (Labor)
勤労所得: (きんろうしょとく) - earned income
勤労者財産形成促進: (きんろうしゃざいさんけいせいそくしん) - (workers) asset formation
勤労階級: (きんろうかいきゅう) - salaried class; working class
勤勉家: (きんべんか) - diligent worker; hard worker
勤務中: (きんむちゅう) - on duty; at work; while working
勤務交代: (きんむこうたい) - change of shifts
勤務医: (きんむい) - doctor working in a hospital; physician working in public practice
勤務地: (きんむち) - duty station; place of business; work location
勤務場所: (きんむばしょ) - workplace; place of work
勤務年限: (きんむねんげん) - term of service
勤務成績: (きんむせいせき) - (one's) work performance; performance record; service record
勤務時間: (きんむじかん) - office (business, working) hours
勤務者: (きんむしゃ) - workers; men on duty
勤務評定: (きんむひょうてい) - (work) performance evaluation; performance review; efficiency rating
勤学学生: (きんがくがくせい) - working student
勤怠: (きんたい) - diligence and indolence; diligence; attendance; attendance and absence
勤王: (きんのう) - loyalty to the emperor; loyalism
勤王攘夷: (きんのうじょうい) - (yoji) loyalty to the emperor and expulsion of the foreigners
勤番: (きんばん) - taking turns on duty (esp. daimyo's retainers on duty in Edo)
勤皇: (きんのう) - loyalty to the emperor; loyalism
勤皇攘夷: (きんのうじょうい) - (yoji) loyalty to the emperor and expulsion of the foreigners
勤続者: (きんぞくしゃ) - man of long service
勤行時報係: (ごんぎょうじほうがかり) - muezzin
勧める: (すすめる) - to recommend; to advise; to encourage; to offer (wine)
勧世縒: (かんぜより) - twisted paper; twisted-paper string
勧告状: (かんこくじょう) - letter of advice
勧告者: (かんこくしゃ) - adviser; advisor; counselor; counsellor
勧善懲悪: (かんぜんちょうあく) - (yoji) rewarding good and punishing evil; novel or drama with a rewarding-good-and-punishing-evil theme; moral purpose; morality play
勧善懲悪劇: (かんぜんちょうあくげき) - morality play
勧善懲悪小説: (かんぜんちょうあくしょうせつ) - (Edo-period) didactic novel or fiction
勧奨退職: (かんしょうたいしょく) - retirement at the behest of one's employer
勧業博覧会: (かんぎょうはくらんかい) - industrial fair or exposition
勧誘: (kan 'yuu) - invitation, solicitation, canvassing, canvasing, inducement, persuasion, encouragement
勧誘員: (かんゆういん) - canvasser; traveling salesman; travelling salesman; door-to-door solicitor
勧請: (かんじょう) - praying for the coming of a deity; ceremonial transfer of a divided tutelary deity to a new location
